reviewText: Although dated, this film depicts the realities of surviving coma as the result of head injury.  Introduced by Sunny Von Bulow's children, the film features 2 young women who, through separate traumatic incidents, are adjusting to speech, language, motor, cognitive, and social changes.  I show this film to my undergraduate students...a reminder that head injury can change the trajectory of one's life as well as the lives of family members.
